text: Oh
hi guys I'm Laura Vitale and today I
want to share just a really quick simple
and easy cocktail for the new year I
think you always have to have a cocktail
just to bring in the new year and this
is a really simple and easy one I call
it my pomegranate bubbly because that's
exactly what it is you'll just need some
champagne some pomegranate juice and
some superfine sugar now I like to add a
little bit of superfine sugar to mine
just because the pomegranate juice can
be a bit tart and not like it a little
bit sweeter but you can of course leave
that out and you can make this an
alcoholic free beverage by just
substituting some club soda for the
champagne that's it it's very simple
everything gets made into your champagne
glass I'm going to put a little bit of
superfine sugar in there tap it with
pomegranate juice give this a stir I use
the back of a fork just because it's
easier and then just tap it
buy some champagne and it gets all
bubbly and gorgeous and you'll see I
love the color woah oh guys so good it's
so good and it looks so festive and it's
so easy to put together and look at that
it's easy you can do it you can do them
all one go if you've got a big row you
know of champagne glasses ready this
would be definitely like something cool
to do in front of your friends because
it'll all bubble up and look so fancy so
that's it I hope you enjoy spending time
with me and I want to wish you your
family friends all your loved one a very
happy and healthy fabulous New Year to
you
